div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

br.h6: 2020-2021 PreK Application -- 2020-2021 Calendar -- Parent Letter -- BOE Drug Testing Policy

div.p:
Important Information from the Johnson-Brock Backpack Program:
Food backpacks will still be available throughout the school closure. As of now, school will be back in session before the next distribution. If school remains closed, food backpacks and vouchers will continue to be available at Johnson Grocery. If school closes for more than two weeks, Johnson-Brock Public School will deliver your food backpack to your home. Delivery dates will be April 3, April 17, May 1 and May 15. When school reopens, your child will get his/her food backpack from school or your normal pick up location. If you have any questions, please call Johnson Grocery at 868-3145.

Due to extenuating circumstance the NHD & Speech Night set for Thursday March 5th has been postponed. It is tentatively rescheduled for Sunday March 22nd. NHD at 6:00 pm and Speech at 7:00 pm. Keep watch for any updates, here and on the weekly schedule.

Food Science Team 1st Place. ---> Going to State

Environmental/Nat. Resources Team 4th Place. --->Going to State
